column.Name: WorkflowType
column.lookupquery: SELECT WorkflowTemplateID, TemplateName FROM pWorkflowTemplate WHERE Active = 1 ORDER BY TemplateName

column.Name: SizeClassId
column.lookupquery: SELECT CustomId, Custom FROM pSizeClass Where Active = 1 ORDER BY CustomKey

column.Name: SizeRangeId
column.lookupquery: SELECT CustomId, SizeRangeCode FROM pSizeRange Where Active = 1 ORDER BY SizeRangeCode

column.Name: DivisionID
column.lookupquery: SELECT CustomID, Custom FROM iCustom1 div INNER JOIN fnx_Permissions_GetGuidProductTypePermissions('##TEAMID##', 26) access ON access.ProductTypeId = div.CustomID AND access.PermissionRoleID > 0 WHERE Active=1 ORDER BY Custom

column.Name: StyleType
column.lookupquery: SELECT a.StyleTypeID, b.StyleTypeDescription FROM pDivisionStyleType a INNER JOIN pStyleType b on b.StyleTypeID = a.StyleTypeID INNER JOIN pStyleTypeTemplate stt ON b.StyleTypeTemplateID = stt.StyleTypeTemplateID INNER JOIN fnx_Permissions_GetIntProductTypePermissions('##TEAMID##', 2) p ON p.ProductTypeId = a.StyleTypeID WHERE b.Active=1 AND DivisionID = ##ID## AND (p.PermissionView = 1 OR p.PermissionRoleID = 3) ORDER BY b.StyleTypeDescription

column.Name: StyleCategory
column.lookupquery: SELECT StyleCategoryId, StyleCategory FROM pStyleCategory Where Active = 1 ORDER BY StyleCategory

column.Name: CustomField3
column.lookupquery: SELECT Custom AS CustomKey, Custom FROM xCustom8 Where Active = 1 ORDER BY CustomKey

column.Name: Designer
column.lookupquery: SELECT LTRIM(RTRIM(ISNULL(FirstName, '') + ' ' + ISNULL(LastName, ''))) AS name, LTRIM(RTRIM(ISNULL(FirstName, '') + ' ' + ISNULL(LastName, ''))) AS NameKey FROM users WHERE TradePartner = 0 AND Title='Designer' ORDER BY name

column.Name: TechnicalDesigner
column.lookupquery: SELECT LTRIM(RTRIM(ISNULL(FirstName, '') + ' ' + ISNULL(LastName, ''))) AS name, LTRIM(RTRIM(ISNULL(FirstName, '') + ' ' + ISNULL(LastName, ''))) AS NameKey FROM users WHERE TradePartner = 0 AND Title='Tech Designer' ORDER BY name

column.Name: ProductionManager
column.lookupquery: SELECT LTRIM(RTRIM(ISNULL(FirstName, '') + ' ' + ISNULL(LastName, ''))) AS name, LTRIM(RTRIM(ISNULL(FirstName, '') + ' ' + ISNULL(LastName, ''))) AS NameKey FROM users WHERE TradePartner = 0 AND Title='Sourcing' ORDER BY name

column.Name: WashType
column.lookupquery: SELECT CustomKey, Custom FROM xCustom5 ORDER BY Custom

column.Name: StyleSet
column.lookupquery: SELECT Custom, CustomKey FROM xCustom9 ORDER BY Custom
